post.body: Everyone do something crazy for me this year, cuz I gots to work tonight. Bah. Happy New Year
what do you do when your hero needs a hero?
The fire's only half dead. How many angels can you fit on a match head?
I love watching the stories that come from the beat and the booze.
I'm also heading out to the replay.
I just joined the lawrence Twitter Group http://tgr.me/g/lawrence and you can too. Please Retweet.
ah, late nights in a cold bed.
Why do i have the jefferson.s theme song stuck go my head?
Any time i feel like shit i just need to play the top gun theme and everything will be ok.
I love exploring old hard drives.
Currently doing cpr on my machine.
Fuck. My computer just died. Fuck. Fuck fuck fuck.
And maybe i'm somewhere inbeetween
How do zen spiders look for love?
Every now and then, i remember why i am an angel and not a demon.
I thought i had lost my road rage. Turns out i just moved out of wichita.
I find it amazing that after almost 24 hours awake and family and drinking. I still wake up after 5 hours of sleep/
Off to see the wizard. I hear he has a supply of titties and booze, but the cost may be high. Happy thanksgiving. Drop a dollar in the can.
I hate, however, culling techno compilations for the three good tracks for my workout mix.
I love exposing people to good beer and firefly in the same night.
